front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology -- Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(TM)) -- Technical Corrigendum 1
front.abstract: This Technical Corrigendum addresses problems discovered since the approval of The Open Group Base Specifications, Issue 6, IEEE Std 1003.1-2001, and ISO/IEC 9945: 2002. These are mainly due to resolving integration issues raised by the merger of the original Base documents.
